text: Hi Pablo, thanks for veeeery detailed reply; I`ll try to to apply the method you suggest; I m currently in contact with Lavision, because I have serious suspects that our system is partially misaligned (in a way that I can`t control) and I want to try with them if we can fix it; if we still have problem, I ll be very glad to hear your opinion.Cheers
